desc: Masarap Box - Filipino Snacks Subscription Box

layout.text:
Masarap Box features new, nostalgic and hard-to-find Filipino snacks and goodies in a carefully curated themed snack box that’s delivered right to your door!
We are passionate about up-and-coming Filipino small businesses and we regularly collaborate with small businesses in the Bay Area and in the Philippines to feature new and exciting treats!
All Masarap Box orders include FREE U.S. shipping via UPS.
